name: @~lisfan/vue-image-loader
description: vue指令插件-图片加载器：若请求的资源图片加载失败，使用默认占位图片代替

scripts.pub-n: npm run pub-prerelease && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pub-a: npm run pub-prerelease && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.pub-b: npm run pub-prerelease && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.pub-rc: npm run pub-prerelease && npm publish --tag rc

author: lisfan <goolisfan@gmail.com> (https://www.npmjs.com/~lisfan)
